extendedInfo.description: You make the live! Download the App and show your feelings live on your Facebook wall or Fan Page!You can:-capture news, become a freelance and communicate them live to the community with 1 click-get fame with your band directly from your garage-share your feelings with your friends or relatives-post a live video comment on your Facebook wall or Fan PageLive video is the most powerful communication way, this App makes available this tool in a super simple and quick way to EVERYBODY!************************************************1. Fill in  the description 2. Update it3. Post on Facebook4. Click ON AIR5. Tap on START!6. At the end tap STOP and then QUIT to save the live!Stream the show!*******************************************************You can contact us atwww.cam-onnet.comwww.facebook.com/camonnetinfo@cam-onnet.com
